column4: !dualboot just tells me how to install ubuntu with windows, i have win xp and ubuntu installed but i cant load a linux live cd, i need something to install a bootloader from win xp or from cd without a full linux live cd
why can't you load a live CD?
that shouldn't have anything to do w/ loading a live CD
i don't know, that doesn't make much sense... google Super Grub disk
